sameAnalysis.part_name: 这组动词均含有"给予，赠给"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: give, accord, award, confer，grant, endow, present, bestow
means: give ： 最普通用词，泛指将自己的东西给予他人，所给予的东西，物质或非物质的均可。
accord ： 侧重所给予的是应得的或是恰当的，或是因某种原因而适于接受的。
award ： 通常暗示所给予的东西是接受者应得的，而且给予者往往是具有裁判权力的。
confer ： 通常指授予称号或学位等。
grant ： 多指出于慷慨、怜悯或正义感而给予，并且通常是在被请求下给予。
endow ： 指捐赠大量的钱作基金，也可指给予非物质的东西。
present ： 指正式地给予或授予，通常伴有仪式进行。
bestow ： 正式用词，指把某物作为礼物赠送于某人，也可作引申用。

sentence.Network_en: Herbs have been used for centuries to endow a whole range of foods with subtle flavours.
sentence.Network_cn: 数个世纪以来，香草一直被用于给各种食物增添淡淡的香味。

sentence.Network_en: Ramon had managed to endow the figurine with a primitive beauty.
sentence.Network_cn: 拉蒙已做到给予这个人像以一种原始的美.

sentence.Network_en: The polyphonic features endow Light in August with eternal vitality.
sentence.Network_cn: 复调性赋予《八月之光》不息的生命力.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 考研英语常见词根的来历(词源) - 豆丁网 ... index n. 索引 endow 捐赠 3.1 dig- 实际上是一回事.
2013年考研英语新增词汇_百度文库 ... eminent adj. 著名的；卓越的 endow vt. 资助,赋予,授予 entail vt. 使必需,使承担.
大学英语六级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... endeavor n. 努力,事业, endow vt. 资助；赋予，授予 endurance n. 忍耐(力)；持久(力).
英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... endorse 背书; 赞同 endow 赋与 endure 忍受,忍耐,持久.

list.abs: 字典中丰字的解释 ... (13) 丰厚;富裕[ be rich;thick] (15) 富饶[ richly endowed;fertile] (17) 豆器所盛丰富的[ abundant].
经济学英语词汇 - 豆丁网 ... initial condition 初始条件 initial endowment 初始禀赋 innovation 创新.
禀赋效应（Endowment effect）：总认为自己的东西是最好的。在交易的时候总觉得自己吃亏了。
原赋效应(Endowment Effect)对于要将某个东西卖出去，一般人所要求的价格通常比他们愿意花钱去买的价格来得高。造成原赋效应的 …
养老保险(Endowment Insurance)是国家依据相关法律法规规定,为解决劳动者在达到国家规定的解除劳动义务的劳动年龄界限,或因年老丧失劳.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (also in the sense 'provide a dower or dowry'; formerly also as indow): from legal Anglo-Norman French endouer, from en- 'in, towards' + Old French douer 'give as a gift' (from Latin dotare: see dower)

entry.def: You say that someone is endowed with a particular desirable ability, characteristic, or possession when they have it by chance or by birth.

example.ex: You are endowed with wealth, good health and a lively intellect.
example.tran: 你生来就拥有财富、健康和活跃的思维。

entry.def: If you endow something with a particular feature or quality, you provide it with that feature or quality.

example.ex: Herbs have been used for centuries to endow a whole range of foods with subtle flavours.
example.tran: 数个世纪以来，香草一直被用于给各种食物增添淡淡的香味。

entry.tran: 资助，捐助(机构、奖学金、项目等)
entry.def: If someone endows an institution, scholarship, or project, they provide a large amount of money which will produce the income needed to pay for it.

example.ex: The ambassador has endowed a $1 million public-service fellowships program.
example.tran: 大使资助了一项100万美元的公共服务奖学金计划。

sentences.sentence: "When she got married, she got dowered"

means.word_mean: （向学校等机构）捐钱, 捐赠, 资助，赋予

sentences.en: He endowed a bed in a hospital.
sentences.cn: 他向医院捐赠了一张病床。

means.word_mean: 使(某人)天生具有(好资质、能力等)

sentences.en: This country is favourably endowed climatically.
sentences.cn: 这个国家的气候得天独厚。

jushi.english: She is richly endowed by nature.
He endowed a bed in a hospital.
jushi.chinese: 他向医院捐赠了一张病床。

jushi.english: This country is favorably endowed climatically.
jushi.chinese: 这个国家的气候得天独厚。
